name: More Cars
description:
Mana is retextured to cars, and equipment referencing mana is renamed/recolored to match the car theming.

This came about when Notan Lemon of the dicecord showcased a card with a car symbol and noted that it was a retextured mana symbol (as Notan's mod doesn't use mana at all and presumably removes it from Witch), and I jokingly suggested the equipment names for mana-related cards should be changed to match.

Anyway, use this if you're an automobile enthusiast or something.
